theorem putnam_1976_a2
    (P Q : MvPolynomial (Fin 2) ℤ)
    (hP : P = X 0 ^ 2 * X 1 + X 0 * X 1 ^ 2)
    (hQ : Q = X 0 ^ 2 + X 0 * X 1 + X 1 ^ 2)

    (hF : ∀ n, F n = (X 0 + X 1) ^ n - X 0 ^ n - X 1 ^ n)
    (hG : ∀ n, G n = (X 0 + X 1) ^ n + X 0 ^ n + X 1 ^ n)
    (n : ℕ)

    ∃ A : MvPolynomial (Fin 2) ℤ,
      F n = aeval ![P, Q] A ∨
